content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing Setup at (-15, -50)
- Burner mining drill mining iron ore (position -15, -50)
- Wooden chest collecting iron ore (position -14.5, -48.5)
- Stone furnace processing iron ore (position -14, -47)

### Iron Plate Production Line (0, 0)
- Two stone furnaces for iron plate production:
  - First furnace at position (0, 0)
  - Second furnace at position (2, 0)

### Additional Iron Processing Line (4, 4)
- Two stone furnaces for iron plate production:
  - First furnace at position (4, 4)
  - Second furnace at position (6, 4)

### Iron Gear Wheel Assembly Line (24.5, 4.5)
- Assembling machine (position 24.5, 4.5)
- Input wooden chest (position 21.5, 4.5)
- Output wooden chest with iron gear wheels (position 27.5, 4.5)
- Two burner inserters:
  - Input inserter (position 22.5, 4.5)
  - Output inserter (position 26.5, 4.5)

### Power Generation System
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5)
- Boiler (position -2.0, 23.5)
- Steam engine (position 9.5, 19.5)
- Connected pipe network for water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting power consumers

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Ensure coal is harvested before attempting to refuel entities
- Check inventory for sufficient coal before attempting to insert fuel

### Entity Placement Errors
- Verify entity exists at specified position before attempting to interact with it
- Error when trying to access lab at position (24.5, 4.5) - ensure lab is placed before attempting to interact

### Connection Issues
- Steam engine shows "NOT_CONNECTED" status occasionally - ensure proper pipe connections between power components
- Verify all power-consuming entities are connected to the electricity network

### Resource Management
- Monitor boiler fuel levels to maintain consistent power generation
- Keep track of input materials for assemblers to prevent ingredient shortages
